sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect, useReducer } from 'react' import { Col, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Row, Image, Card, Button, Container, } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import ErrorMessageBox from '../components/ErrorMessagebox' import Loading from '../components/Loading' import { getError } from '../utils' const reducer = (state, action) => { switch (action.type) { case 'FETCH_REQUEST': return { ...state, loading: true } case 'FETCH_SUCCESS': return { ...state, donation: action.payload, loading: false } case 'FETCH_fail': return { ...state, loading: false, error: action.payload } default: return state } } function ProjectScreen() { const params = useParams() const { slug } = params const [{ loading, error, donation }, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, { donation: [], loading: true, error: '', }) useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { dispatch({ type: 'FETCH_REQUEST' }) try { const result = await axios.get(`/api/project/slug/${slug}`) dispatch({ type: 'FETCH_SUCCESS', payload: result.data }) } catch (err) { dispatch({ type: 'FETCH_FAIL', payload: getError(err) }) } } fetchData() }, [slug]) return loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

{donation.name}
Location: {donation.Location}
By: {donation.by}

Description: {donation.description}

Challenge: {donation.Challenge}

Solution: {donation.Solution}

Longterm Impact: {donation.LongTermImpact}

Category: {donation.category}
Status:{' '} {donation.donationGoal <= donation.currentdonation ? 'Donation goal has been completed' : 'In progress'}
Donation needed: ${donation.donationGoal}
Collected amount: ${donation.currentdonation}
 ) } export default ProjectScreen
